[by:小陀螺Tony]
[ti:Shower (D!avolo Remix)]

[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:09.43]I don't know, it's just something about ya
[00:11.30]Got me feeling like I can't be without ya
[00:13.28]Anytime someone mention your name
[00:15.86]I be feeling as if I'm around ya
[00:17.99]Ain't no words to describe you baby
[00:20.27]All I know is that you take me high
[00:22.14]Can you tell that you drive me crazy?
[00:24.52]Cause I can't get you out my mind
[00:26.29]
[00:26.70]Think of you when I'm going to bed
[00:28.52]When I wake up think of you again
[00:30.69]You are my homie, lover and friend
[00:32.86]Exactly why
[00:34.18]
[00:34.58]You light me up inside
[00:36.56]Like the 4th of July
[00:38.74]Whenever you're around
[00:40.82]I always seem to smile
[00:43.05]And people ask me how
[00:45.17]Well you're the reason why
